statements: SELECT * FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE competitor_id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, social_media_platform FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, post_date FROM competitors_social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%competition%';
SELECT competitor_name, post_date FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_name, social_media_platform FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE competitor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, post_content FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram' LIMIT 10;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name FROM competitors_social_media_data ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM competitors_social_media_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT competitor_name, social_media_platform FROM competitor_data ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT id, post_date, post_content FROM competitor_data WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_name, sentiment_score, engagement_level FROM competitor_data JOIN analysis_results ON competitor_data.id = analysis_results.competitor_id;
SELECT competitor_name, social_media_platform FROM competitor_data WHERE post_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram' AND post_content LIKE '%product%' ORDER BY post_date ASC;

SELECT competitor_name, post_content, analysis_date FROM competitor_data JOIN analysis_results ON competitor_data.id = analysis_results.competitor_id WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;

SELECT competitor_name, social_media_platform, sentiment_score FROM competitor_data JOIN analysis_results ON competitor_data.id = analysis_results.competitor_id WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%' AND sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;

SELECT competitor_name, engagement_level FROM competitor_data LEFT JOIN analysis_results ON competitor_data.id = analysis_results.competitor_id WHERE engagement_level > 100 ORDER BY engagement_level DESC, competitor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM competitor_social_media_accounts ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM post_engagement WHERE post_id = 5;
SELECT account_name, post_count FROM competitor_social_media_accounts WHERE follower_count > 5000 ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE account_id = 1 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM competitor_social_media_accounts WHERE follower_count > 10000 ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM social_media_posts JOIN post_engagement ON social_media_posts.post_id = post_engagement.post_id WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_name, SUM(follower_count) AS total_followers FROM competitor_social_media_accounts GROUP BY account_name HAVING total_followers > 50000 ORDER BY total_followers DESC;
SELECT post_content, comments_count FROM social_media_posts JOIN post_engagement ON social_media_posts.post_id = post_engagement.post_id WHERE comments_count > 50 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM competitors_activity;
SELECT competitor_id, social_media_platform FROM competitors_activity WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT competitor_id, post_content, post_date FROM competitors_activity ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, likes, comments, shares FROM competitor_engagement WHERE likes > 100 AND shares > 50;
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitors_activity ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM competitors_activity WHERE competitor_id = 'abc123' AND social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT competitor_id, SUM(likes) AS total_likes, SUM(comments) AS total_comments, SUM(shares) AS total_shares FROM competitor_engagement GROUP BY competitor_id ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT competitor_id, engagement_score, sentiment_score FROM competitor_performance WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_score DESC, sentiment_score ASC;

SELECT c.competitor_id, sa.sentiment_score, cp.engagement_score FROM competitors_activity c INNER JOIN sentiment_analysis sa ON c.competitor_id = sa.post_id INNER JOIN competitor_performance cp ON c.competitor_id = cp.competitor_id WHERE sa.sentiment_score > 0.5 AND cp.engagement_score > 100 ORDER BY sa.analysis_date ASC, cp.performance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Accounts;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM Social_Media_Accounts ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_name, follower_count, post_count FROM Social_Media_Accounts WHERE post_count > 100;
SELECT account_name, follower_count, post_count FROM Social_Media_Accounts WHERE account_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY follower_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, follower_count FROM Social_Media_Accounts ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE account_id = 3 ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_name, post_count, follower_count FROM Social_Media_Accounts WHERE follower_count > 10000 AND post_count < 50;

SELECT Social_Media_Accounts.account_name, COUNT(Likes.like_id) AS total_likes FROM Social_Media_Accounts JOIN Likes ON Social_Media_Accounts.account_id = Likes.account_id GROUP BY Social_Media_Accounts.account_name HAVING COUNT(Likes.like_id) > 100;
